At Ready2Frag, we've been blessed to have a wide range of services to offer to our awesome customers over the past two and a half years. Our aging VPS hosting was starting to show its age, and with a lack of updates in regards to the new SolusVM panel, we've decided to release an all-new vps service. Our main focus was on value, with performance and features following very closely.


The Virtualizor control panel has been the perfect addition to our vps hosting services. With more features than SolusVM could ever hope to have, and the ability to support easy-to-use one-click install applications, we've been very happy in our internal testing and look forward to hearing back from our customers with their opinions, suggestions, and ideas for making it even better!


As usual, our servers are proudly hosted in Chicago at the Steadfast Networks 725 S. Wells facility. We make use of Steadfast's incredible financial and healthcare-optimized network, prioritizing speed, low latency, and excellent routing. More info


The VMs themselves run on Intel Xeon E3 or E5 machines running at a minimum of 3.3GHz, DDR3/DDR4 RAM, and RAID-10 SSD storage. VM machines are never oversold and always built to enterprise standards.
